ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Crescent Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: I do not believe I have ever replied to something on this or if I have it has been a very longtime. I just had to say though that when my STR is buffed up I
ygData.messageBody:
I do not believe I have ever replied to something on this or if I have it has been a very longtime. I just had to say though that when my STR is buffed up I notice a dramatic increase in the number of times I hit and the amount of damage I do. This is not strict scientific data not checked or anything but I do know that all my highs I have ever jotted down with flying kick and weapons attacks are all from when being buffed. If this is a coincidence then so be it. I do know that the 110 hps more I get from wearing Plat FO rings as opposed to any of the better STR rings does not mean a whole lot to me. If one of the mobs in Seb decides it really wants to rip into me with my HPs I am a lost cause anyways.

AC is the top dog but beyond that choose what you want. Whatever makes you happiest. I personally like AC/STR/MR. I just feel that even if it boosts my chances to hit by one percent when I am wielding low delay low damage weapons the more often I hit the more often I do my job which is dealing damage. Lord knows Monks do not have the HPs to be a meat wall.


Ibnalnoor
53rd lvl Monk
